verses.verse: A [good] <S%H8034>name<s%> is to be <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H977>desired<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H2580>Favor<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> and the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H6298>have<s%> a <S%H6298>common<s%> <S%H6298>bond,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H6213>maker<s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
The <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> and <S%H5641>hides<s%> himself, But the <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> on, and are <S%H6064>punished<s%> for it.
The <S%H6118>reward<s%> of <S%H6038>humility<s%> [and] the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> Are <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H9202>honor<s%> and <S%H9132>life.<s%>
<S%H6791>Thorns<s%> [and] <S%H6341>snares<s%> are in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6141>perverse;<s%> He who <S%H8104>guards<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> will be <S%H7368>far<s%> from them.
<S%H2596>Train<s%> up a <S%H5288>child<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> he should go, <S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H2204>old<s%> he will not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from it.
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> over the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> And the <S%H9233>borrower<s%> [becomes] the lender's <S%H5650>slave.<s%>
He who <S%H2232>sows<s%> <S%H9390>iniquity<s%> will <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H205>vanity,<s%> And the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>fury<s%> will <S%H3615>perish.<s%>
He who is <S%H2896>generous<s%> <S%H5869><s%> will be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> For he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of his <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor.<s%>
<S%H1644>Drive<s%> out the <S%H9238>scoffer,<s%> and <S%H4066>contention<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> out, Even <S%H1779>strife<s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> will <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2889>purity<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> [And] whose <S%H8193>speech<s%> is <S%H2580>gracious,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> is his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> But He <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> man.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "There is a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2351>outside;<s%> I shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets!<s%>"
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of an <S%H2114>adulteress<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit;<s%> He who is <S%H2194>cursed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> into it.

<S%H200>Foolishness<s%> is <S%H7194>bound<s%> up in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H5288>child;<s%> The <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H4148>discipline<s%> will <S%H7368>remove<s%> it <S%H7368>far<s%> from him.

He who <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H7235>make<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> for himself Or who <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H6223>rich,<s%> [will] <S%H389>only<s%> [come to] <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
<S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> And <S%H7896>apply<s%> your <S%H3820>mind<s%> to my <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%>
For it will be <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H8104>keep<s%> them <S%H990>within<s%> you, That they may be <S%H3559>ready<s%> on your <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
So that your <S%H4009>trust<s%> may be in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H3045>taught<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> you.
Have I not <S%H3789>written<s%> to you <S%H7991>excellent<s%> <S%H7991>things<s%> Of <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%>
To make you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H9534>certainty<s%> of the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> That you may <S%H571>correctly<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> to him who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you?
Do not <S%H1497>rob<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he is <S%H1800>poor,<s%> Or <S%H1792>crush<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate;<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>case,<s%> And <S%H6906>take<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of those who <S%H6906>rob<s%> them.
Do not <S%H9565>associate<s%> with a <S%H1167>man<s%> [given] to <S%H639>anger;<s%> Or <S%H935>go<s%> with a hot-tempered <S%H376>man,<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H502>learn<s%> his <S%H734>ways,<s%> And <S%H3947>find<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> for <S%H5315>yourself.<s%>
Do not be among those who <S%H8628>give<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H8628>pledges,<s%> <S%H3709><s%> Among those who <S%H6148>become<s%> <S%H6148>sureties<s%> for <S%H4859>debts.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> with which to <S%H9608>pay,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should he <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H4904>bed<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> you?
Do not <S%H5472>move<s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>boundary<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> your fathers have <S%H1>set.<s%>

Do you <S%H2372>see<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4106>skilled<s%> in his <S%H4399>work<s%>? He will <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> He will not <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2823>obscure<s%> <S%H2823>men.<s%>
